title: Exceptional thermoelectric performance in AB2Sb2-type Zintl phases through band shaping
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,1416-1425
DOI: 10.1039/D3EE04164F, Paper
Jingdan Lei, Hexige Wuliji, Qingyong Ren, Xiaowen Hao, Hongliang Dong, Heyang Chen, Tian-Ran Wei, Jiawei Zhang, Pengfei Qiu, Kunpeng Zhao, Xun Shi
We obtained exceptional power factors and zT values in p-type Mg3Sb2-based materials by alloying Zn at the Mg2 sites for double band degeneracy and alloying Yb at the Mg1 sites of Mg3Sb2 for decreased band effective mass.
